bodies.title: Who I am
bodies.description: I'm currently based in Berlin and available to work locally or remotely. I have extensive experience in the film and tv/web advertising industries and know the ins and outs of these worlds. I have also experience in publishing. I'm a creative problem solver and excel at finding solutions to untypical problems.
